Border Style

# Border Style

## Usage

Please refer to the documentation on the Tailwind CSS website

## Compatibility

Use `border-0` instead of `border-none` to remove borders on native.

| Class                 | Support        |
| --------------------- | -------------- |
| ```
border-solid
```  | âœ… Full Support |
| ```
border-dashed
``` | âœ… Full Support |
| ```
border-dotted
``` | âœ… Full Support |
| ```
border-none
```   | ğŸŒ Web only    |
| ```
border-double
``` | ğŸŒ Web only    |
| ```
border-hidden
``` | ğŸŒ Web only    |
